com.jagacy
Class AbstractSession

java.lang.Object
  com.jagacy.AbstractSession
Direct Known Subclasses:
Session3270
public abstract class AbstractSession
extends java.lang.Object

Supports a screen-scraping session.

Author:
Robert M. Preston

Returns:
The logger used by Jagacy. Note that trace and watch modes are used internally. Will return null if log4j is used.

waitForChange

public boolean waitForChange(int timeout)
                      throws JagacyException
Waits for the screen to change and the keyboard to unlock. (Not recommended for use with Jagacy VT. Use: waitForChange(int mainTimeout, int trailingTimeout), waitForChange(int timeout, String tag), or waitForChange(int mainTimeout, int trailingTimeout, String tag))

Parameters:
timeout - Amount of time to wait (in milliseconds).
Returns:
true if screen changed and keyboard unlocked; false otherwise.
Throws:
JagacyException - If an error occurs.

waitForChange

public boolean waitForChange(java.lang.String timeoutProperty)
                      throws JagacyException
Waits for the screen to change and the keyboard to unlock. (Not recommended for use with Jagacy VT. Use: waitForChange(String mainTimeoutProperty, String trailingTimeoutProperty), waitForChangeProperty(String timeoutProperty, String tagProperty), or waitForChange(String mainTimeoutProperty, String trailingTimeoutProperty, String tagProperty))

Parameters:
timeoutProperty - Property to lookup (if property ends with '.seconds', value will be converted to milliseconds).
Returns:
true if screen changed and keyboard unlocked; false otherwise.
Throws:
JagacyException - If an error occurs.

readCursor

public int[] readCursor()
                 throws JagacyException
Deprecated. As of Jagacy 3270 1.2 / Jagacy VT 1.0, replaced by readCursorLocation()

Reads the cursor.

Returns:
int[0] is the cursor's row, and int[1] is the cursor's column.

JagacyException - If an error occurs.

JagacyException - If an error occurs.

Jagacy 3270 2.0, Jagacy VT 2.0

                   throws JagacyException

JagacyException - If an error occurs.

getAttributeForPosition

public int getAttributeForPosition(int row,
                                   int column)
                            throws JagacyException
Deprecated. As of Jagacy 3270 2.0 / Jagacy VT 2.0, replaced by readFeature(com.jagacy.Location)

Used internally. Returns the raw attribute associated with the given coordinates.

Parameters:
row - Row (indexed from 0).
column - Column (indexed from 0).
Returns:
The attribute or -1 if the screen is unformatted.
Throws:
JagacyException - If an error occurs.
See Also:
Field.getAttribute()
